remarks: Two ways to express " ` A ` and ` B ` are completely disjoint subspaces."  (1) => (2) in Lemma 5 of [Holland] p. 1520.  (Contributed by NM, 21-May-2005.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdj1.1 $e |- A e. SH $.
cdj1.2 $e |- B e. SH $.
cdj1i $p |- ( E. w e. RR ( 0 < w /\ A. y e. A A. v e. B ( ( normh ` y ) + ( normh ` v ) ) <_ ( w x. ( normh ` ( y +h v ) ) ) ) -> E. x e. RR ( 0 < x /\ A. y e. A A. z e. B ( ( normh ` y ) = 1 -> x <_ ( normh ` ( y -h z ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B v w x y z $.
